text: Khosrow Sinai (, 19 January 1941 â€“ 1 August 2020) was an Iranian movie director, screenwriter, music composer and scholar. He was born in Sari, Iran. He was known for his movie In the Alleys of Love. Sinai died on 1 August 2020 in Tehran from COVID-19, aged 79.Iranian film director Khosrow Sinai dies of COVID-19 ==References== * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Iranian screenwriters Category:Iranian composers Category:Iranian academics Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran
